Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory72.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I can't let her know I'm here to save my people...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Those who're trapped inside are on the Purifying Force's kill list.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's already difficult to rescue someone in a heavily guarded place...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If the Purifying Force or anyone else gets involved, we'll pay the price.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "(Looks around) If I had built this place, I would've put the cells at the lowest level.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If I can find a map of this place, not only will I locate the cells, but I can also avoid all these guards on the way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Speaking of which... this has been quite an eye-opening rescue op.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I can't believe such a sanctuary would still exist on Earthâ€”the level of Punish Virus concentration here is way too low.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The Purifying Force is here... they're probably looking into why this is happening...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Besides them, there must be others involved.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'If Nikola figured out that there may be an antidote here for the virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "He wouldn't stop, no matter how many lives of his soldiers it costs him.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Nikola is a piece of shit, but he's no gambler.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "He must've held some concrete intel to send the Purifying Force. It means that this antidote may actually be real...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'A cure... to the Punishing Virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No cure is more important than the lives of my people.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I'll leave saving the world to Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How do I get my hands on a map of this place?', 4: '1'}
